rectangles
Class IceBlockRectangle

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
          java.awt.Rectangle
              rectangles.ItemRectangle
                  rectangles.IceBlockRectangle
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class IceBlockRectangle
extends ItemRectangle

This class contains the rectangles for the IceBlock that will be used for collisions.

Author:
Team Exception
See Also:
IceBlock, Rectangle, ItemRectangle, Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

IceBlockRectangle

public IceBlockRectangle(int x,
                         int y)
This is the class constructor for the IceBlockRectangle class. It will create the geometry class collision rectangle for this object.

Parameters:
x - horizontal component of its location
y - vertical component of its location
